main event: Two military pilots observed a bright light moving rapidly overhead at Keesler AFB, Mississippi on 23 Aug 1952.
interesting points: The light was larger than any normal aircraft light,The lights maneuvered in an irregular manner,Observation duration was approximately 5 to 10 seconds,The weather was clear with no other aircraft known in the area,The pilots were unable to identify the source of the light.
witness description: military pilots returning from training flight
